name: The Last 2 Vampires
description:
CW: suicidal themes

[please do not play if you feel sensitive to such themes.]

And when I awoke, he was gone.

Inspired by The Vampire Chronicles by Anne Rice.  The story centres two vampires: one who is dying and one who is afraid of being alone. There a two endings to the game, although the choice is not always clear.

This is my first Bitsy game that I made for a uni project. Took about two weeks to make, which means it still needs a little polish around the edges. Would love any feedback you could give, as well as your interpretation of the story and characters~

Additionally, I fell ill when finishing this project so I couldn't play test as much as I wanted before hitting (missing) the deadline, so if there are any mistakes feel free to say. I may update this if I have the time. 

Made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux with the help of:

-Pixsy

-Bitsy room converter

-Borksy

-My friends and peers :3

-My boyfriend who dealt with me constantly asking dumb questions about things he had no experience with<3
